topic.title: Three Ways to Input Manufacturing Downtime

body.p:
There are three ways to input manufacturing defects into Sight Machine:
Managers and QA lab technicians: Batch defect entry on the Sight Machine Data Tab
Line Operators: Manual real-time, single-defect entry using a tablet
Automated Defect Entry: Through automated inspection
body.note: While manufacter defect input is done in essentially these three ways no matter the product, the Sight Machine application is flexible enough to consume vitually any input device on any machine. Whether you're measuring steering column lock assemblies or top-stitching on soccer shoes, Sight Machine has a way to input the defect: and to view that defect in the application.
